entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
